name: HAFiscal Development (TeX Live 2025) - ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget perl build-essential fontconfig curl git zsh && if [ ! -d /home/vscode/.oh-my-zsh ]; then sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" "" --unattended || true && chsh -s $(which zsh) vscode || true; fi
postCreateCommand: set -e; SCRIPT="${workspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/run-setup.sh"; if [ ! -f "$SCRIPT" ]; then SCRIPT=$(find /workspaces -name run-setup.sh -path '*/.devcontainer/run-setup.sh' 2>/dev/null | head -1); fi; if [ -f "$SCRIPT" ]; then bash "$SCRIPT"; else echo '❌ run-setup.sh not found, trying direct setup.sh...'; bash -c 'find /workspaces -name setup.sh -path "*/.devcontainer/setup.sh" -exec bash {} \;' || (echo '❌ setup.sh not found'; exit 1); fi
postStartCommand: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"; if command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "✅ UV found: $(which uv)"; else echo "⚠️  UV not in PATH - checking installation..."; [ -f "$HOME/.local/bin/uv" ] && export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" || [ -f "$HOME/.cargo/bin/uv" ] && export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" || echo "❌ UV not found"; fi; if [ -f "${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/activate" ]; then source "${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/activate" && echo "✅ Virtual environment activated: $(which python)"; else echo "⚠️  .venv not found - run: uv sync --all-groups"; fi
